name: Would you rather
description: This form collects your preferences on three thought-provoking 'Would You Rather' questions.

formDefinition.title: Would You Rather Survey
formDefinition.description: This form collects your preferences on three thought-provoking 'Would You Rather' questions.

elements.name: question1
elements.title: Would you rather have the ability to fly or be invisible?

elements.name: question2
elements.title: Would you rather live in a cave or live in a treehouse?

elements.name: question3
elements.title: Would you rather have more time or more money?
